wikipedia_page.main: Christie Goodwin (born 1962) is an English art photographer who specialises in music photography.

response: During 2017 and 2018 Chris was in the studio again working on 14 new self penned/produced songs, including a co -write with Chris Difford and featuring guest vocalists Sumudu Jayatilaka Siobhan Parr and Katy Shotter with Ash Soan and Jim Kimberley on drums Dave Swift and Ron Box guitars and mixing duties Golden Hour was released in 2019 with photography by Christie Goodwin.
